channel.title: My topic was deleted without notice
channel.description:
Hello, my topic (title "Spawn City") was in this section and has been deleted without notice. If city topics are against the board rules, it should be stated or I should at least be informed of it when the topic is deleted.
inb4 pm staff, nobody replies to their messages

item.title: My topic was deleted without notice
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I reply to my messages usually. I’ll have a look around the trash can and see if I can find it.

edit: Restored it. http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,178.0.html Don’t know who deleted it, but hopefully an unknown deletion won’t happen again.

Read full topic
item.source: My topic was deleted without notice
